Contains 1 Servings Oven Cook From Frozen Preheat oven Remove sleeve Do not remove film Place on a baking tray in centre of oven Heat until piping hot Remove from oven on baking tray, stand for 2 minutes before serving (Time 35-40 mins Oven: 180�C, Fan: 160�C, Gas: Gas Mark gas 4) Microwave From Frozen Microwave ovens vary: refer to handbook Remove sleeve Pierce film in several places Place on a microwaveable plate Peel back film, stir mash and turn sausages halfway through heating and re-cover Stand for 2 minutes Check food is piping hot - if not reheat for further brief period (650W: 6� Mins, 750W: 6 Mins, 850W: 5� Mins) Other General For best results, microwave Do not reheat once cooled Recycling Component Material Recyclable film Plastic - Other No sleeve Cardboard Yes tray Plastic -PET Yes Please note that whilst we take every care to ensure the product information displayed on our website is correct, product recipes are regularly changed and this may affect nutrition and allergen information therefore you should always check product labels and not rely solely on the information presented here.
